entry.dcterms:description: numerous standard political variables in both surveys; the political and general life history of the respondent during the past 8 years; family relationships
entry.dcterms:subject: science and technology
family life, marriage, relationship
local society, region
psychology
social stratification and groupings
mass political behavior, attitudes
social behaviour and attitudes
person
survey data
time-series

97 high schools taken from a national sample of high schools weighted by their size. 15-21 senior students from each school. From the parents, the mother was asked in 1/3rd of the cases, the father in 1/3rd of the cases, and both parents again in 1/3rd of the cases.
data collection with questionnaire
A
